message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="team-lead" summary="Identity + status report (not translator)">
Everyone EXCEPT translator-2: Reply to team-lead with:
1. Your role/identity
2. What files you have loaded (report name + essays)
3. What happened since your last identity report to team-lead

Brief answers only. Reply to team-lead, not to each other.
</teammate-message>

input.content:
1. **Role:** Editor (润文, literary polisher).

2. **Files loaded:** Memo.md, Afterword-Blueprint.md, Review-Essay4-DaoDeRenYiLi.md, Translators-Preface.md, plus all 8 source essays (Essays 1-8).

3. **Since last identity report:** Nothing has changed. No files edited, no actions taken, no outreach. Continued receiving expert messages (mostly confirmations of the finalized Reporting Protocol and a few stray requests). Responded "Noted" to all per your wait-quietly instruction. Still waiting for task assignment.
input.summary: Editor status: no changes, still waiting
